title: Arizona Cardinals Mobile
description:
Welcome to the official mobile app of the Arizona Cardinals.  Make your Android device a unique part of your Cardinals experience at any time, from any place.
Catch Cardinals breaking news, see real-time statistics and watch on-demand video clips of press conferences and player interviews.  The Arizona Cardinals mobile app also features comprehensive pre-game, in-game and post-game coverage as well as a direct connection to our various social media networks.
Highlights Include:
News:  Real-time breaking news from the Cardinals, game previews, blogs, feature stories and more.
Video:  On-demand clips of press conferences, interviews and more.
Photos:  Galleries of games, practices and special events.
Audio:  Various interviews and podcasts including The Big Red Rage and Cardinals Underground.
Stats:  Real-time player stats, head-to-head comparisons, drive summaries, scoreboards and more.
Standings:  Division and conference standings.
Fantasy:  Keep track of your favorite fantasy players.
Depth Chart:  Review the offensive, defensive and special teams depth charts.
Social Media:  Links to Cardinals accounts on Twitter, Facebook, Google+, Instagram and Pinterest.  Check in to the stadium on gameday!
Schedule:  View the season schedule and results and purchase tickets to games.
Follow @AZCardinals on Twitter for updates or visit www.azcardinals.com
Follow @yinzcam on Twitter for updates or to ask questions and provide feedback.
description_html:
Welcome to the official mobile app of the Arizona Cardinals. Make your Android device a unique part of your Cardinals experience at any time, from any place.

Catch Cardinals breaking news, see real-time statistics and watch on-demand video clips of press conferences and player interviews. The Arizona Cardinals mobile app also features comprehensive pre-game, in-game and post-game coverage as well as a direct connection to our various social media networks.

Highlights Include:

News: Real-time breaking news from the Cardinals, game previews, blogs, feature stories and more.

Video: On-demand clips of press conferences, interviews and more.

Photos: Galleries of games, practices and special events.

Audio: Various interviews and podcasts including The Big Red Rage and Cardinals Underground.

Stats: Real-time player stats, head-to-head comparisons, drive summaries, scoreboards and more.

Standings: Division and conference standings.

Fantasy: Keep track of your favorite fantasy players.

Depth Chart: Review the offensive, defensive and special teams depth charts.

Social Media: Links to Cardinals accounts on Twitter, Facebook, Google+, Instagram and Pinterest. Check in to the stadium on gameday!

Schedule: View the season schedule and results and purchase tickets to games.

Follow @AZCardinals on Twitter for updates or visit www.azcardinals.com

Follow @yinzcam on Twitter for updates or to ask questions and provide feedback.
